"Create a DIY air conditioning system using household items such as fans, ice packs, and insulated containers to keep your home cool during hot summer months."
"Design a mobile air conditioning unit that can be carried around in a backpack for camping trips or outdoor events."
"Develop an air conditioning system that uses renewable energy sources such as solar power or wind power to operate."
"Create a smart air conditioning system that learns your temperature preferences and adjusts accordingly."
"Design an air conditioning system that uses evaporative cooling technology to cool the air without consuming electricity."
